subject: RE: [junit] Junit/Ant/Tinderbox
msgSnippet: Try: CruiseControl http://cruisecontrol.sourceforge.net ... Throw away my code, but never, never throw away my tests. ... Jeffrey D. Brekke
messageBody:
Try:

CruiseControl

http://cruisecontrol.sourceforge.net

-----------------------------------------------------------------
Throw away my code, but never, never throw away my tests.
-----------------------------------------------------------------
Jeffrey D. Brekke Quad/Graphics
Jeff.Brekke@... http://www.qg.com
-----------------------------------------------------------------



> -----Original Message-----
> From: jesse_mcconnell@... [mailto:jesse_mcconnell@...]
> Sent: Thursday, August 09, 2001 10:49 AM
> To: junit@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [junit] Junit/Ant/Tinderbox
>
>
>
> I have a setup of a project using Ant automagically building and
> testing with Mozilla's tinderbox.
>
> I am trying to figure out the bext way to get the stacktrace printed
> out in the build log when a failure of error is detected. Is there
> some special ant flag for junit that provided this function? Is there
> another way to do it?
>
> Thanks!
> Jesse
